verse.name: c1
verse.lines: How great our joy! Great our joy! newline Joy, joy, joy! newline Joy, joy, joy! newline Praise we the Lord in heaven on high! newline Praise we the Lord in heaven on high!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: While by the sheep we watched at night, newline Glad tidings brought an angel bright.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: There shall be born so He did say, newline In Bethlehem a Child today.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: There shall the Child lie in a stall, newline This Child who shall redeem us all.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: This gift of God we'll cherish well, newline That every joy our hearts shall fill.
